## packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

## grab the data

```{r}
AirPassengers
```

This is a time series, so I need to turn it into a data frame. I decided to make the year and month myself.

```{r}
month_names=month(1:12,label=T)
month_names
data.frame(count=as.integer(AirPassengers)) %>% 
  bind_cols(crossing(yy=1949:1960,mm=month_names)) %>%
  mutate(the_date=str_c(yy,"-",mm,"-15")) %>% 
  mutate(the_date=ymd(the_date)) -> air
air
```



Now plot against time:

```{r}
ggplot(air,aes(x=the_date,y=count))+geom_point()+geom_line()
```

- increasing trend
- increasing up-and-down (variability)
- trend within a year

save

```{r}
air %>% write_csv("airline_passengers.csv")
```

means by month?

```{r}
air %>% group_by(mm) %>% summarize(m=mean(count))
```

boxplots by month

```{r}
ggplot(air,aes(x=factor(mm),y=count))+geom_boxplot()
```
